gallant.description: My first car that I bought from a coworker in 2019 at my first job at Publix. Car broke down three months after buying it in the middle of the road because a serpentine belt that connected basically everything together failed. Would have cost more to replace the air compressor to fix the car than I boguht the car for so I scrapped it.
pros: Made me realize I like driving
cons: Squealed like a diabetic hog when starting up
Was absolutely nasty inside, previous owner had kids

mustang.description: Bought this in 2019 after the Gallant died. Didn't spend perhaps as much time as I could have but I mostly enjoyed it.
pros: Was my first 'real' car, financed and everything
A lot nicer than the Galant, inside and out
More interesting to drive than the Galant
Taught me a bunch of basic car maintenance like oil changes and air filter changes
Decent cargo space, rear seats folded down
Good gas mileage for a 'muscle' car
Ventilated Seats in the Alabama summer
cons: Subpar handling, back liked to break free
Not super quick in the grand scheme of things
Relatively large for a two-door coupe
10-speed automatic started having awfully harsh shifts, would shake the car

corvette.description: I loved this car. I was in love as soon as I saw it on the dealer's website. I traded in the Mustang for it which was great because the Mustang's transmission was probably about to explode

supra.description: Grew bored and tired of the civic so I started looking around for a new car. Almost pulled the trigger on a BMW i8 but I saw this at the local Toyota dealership and I loved the color.
pros: Very unique and in my opinion beautiful exterior
Great infotainment systme borrowed from BMW
